entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, York Factory
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Blowing snow. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy in the afternoon. Blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 in the afternoon. High minus 23. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Blowing snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blowing snow in the evening. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022
